title: Celtics raise banner 18 as franchise greats look on
description: It took 16 years, but the Celtics officially raised banner 18 to the TD Garden rafters Tuesday night, as franchise legends and a sellout crowd looked on.
author: Tim Bontemps

title: Source: Saints, Kamara agree on 2-year extension
description: The New Orleans Saints have agreed to a two-year extension with running back Alvin Kamara, a source told ESPN on Tuesday, confirming a report, an agreement that is worth approximately $24.5 million for the veteran who has 438 rushing yards this season.
author: Katherine Terrell

title: Calafiori injury 'a worry' as Arsenal have 'questions to answer'
description: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta says defender Riccardo Calafiori's injury during the 1-0 win over Shakhtar Donetsk is " a bit of a worry."

title: 'Extraordinary' Vinicius Jr 'will win Ballon d'Or'
description: Minutes after Real Madrid fans were singing for Vinicius Jr to win the Ballon d'Or, the Brazil forward insisted he wants to "stay at the club forever".

title: Live updates: Celtics picking up where they left off in NBA season opener
description: Boston raised its 18th championship banner and then made 17 3s in the first half vs. the new-look Knicks. The Timberwolves and Lakers play later on opening night.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Fantasy Football Week 8 Rankings: QBs
description: The fantasy football experts of Yahoo Fantasy reveal their Week 8 quarterback rankings.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Brundle calls for rule changes after Norris-Verstappen incident
description: I must start this column by congratulating Charles Leclerc on a tremendous victory in Austin, and Ferrari for a dominant one-two finish.

title: Saliba to miss Liverpool clash - how big a miss will he be?
description: Arsenal will be without William Saliba for Sunday's crucial match with Liverpool on Sunday, live on Sky Sports - so how big a miss will he be?
